INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(../include/  ${FLOWVR_INCLUDE_DIR} ${GLUI_INCLUDES})

ADD_EXECUTABLE(settingFreq settingFreq.cpp)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(settingFreq ${FLOWVR_base_LIBRARY} ${FLOWVR_ftl_LIBRARY} ${FLOWVR_mod_LIBRARY} ${OPENGL_LIBRARIES} ${GLUT_LIBRARIES} ${GLUI_LIBRARY} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT})
INSTALL(TARGETS settingFreq  DESTINATION ${MODULE_BIN_DIR})
